lines.text:
[he has just opened a giant safe-like door]
I did it, it's unlocked! Hurry! Let's go inside!

[everyone scrambles to go inside until they hear Ichino]
Ow! Don't come in! It's a nuclear reactor!
So that's it, it's a heavy water factory.
Huh? What can they do with that?
Atom bombs are made with it.
Huh? I'm getting out of here!
It could be Mothra's asleep at present. Our prayers will reach its source and it will arrive. Yes, I'm sure Mothra is soon going to hear us!
It's too bad Mothra has no alarm clock.
What kind of laboratory, or a factory, is this?
But I didn't pass the first year. One thing's for sure, this place doesn't make toys.
Is breaking in really that easy?
